程序包 com.java.cuiyikai.androidbackend.controllers

类 LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.cuiyikai.androidbackend.controllers.LoginController
  • @Controller
@RequestMapping("/api/login")
public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object

    Controller for the login-related apis.

    Mapped to url "/api/login"

    • 方法详细资料

      • login

        @PostMapping("/")
public void login​(@RequestBody
                  com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject jsonParam,
                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
           throws java.io.IOException

        Receive username and password, and reply request token for this user

        Map to url "/"

        Uses RequestMethod.POST method.

        Reply a JSONObject as follows:

        
 {
     "status"   : "ok" / "fail",
     "message"  : < Message of corresponding result, e.g., log in successfully when success >,
     "token”    : < Only reply when success, user's request token >
 }
        参数:
        jsonParam - A JSONObject with login information, should contain following keys :

        "username" : the username. "password" : the password.

        response - A HttpServletResponse, see PostMapping.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - see PostMapping

      • exchangeToken

        @GetMapping("/exchangeToken")
public void exchangeToken​(@RequestParam("token")
                          java.lang.String token,
                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                   throws java.io.IOException

        Token exchange api.

        Use an old token of a user to exchange a new token.

        Uses RequestMethod.GET method.

        Map to url "/exchangeToken"

        Reply a JSONObject as follows

        
 {
     "status" : "ok" / "fail",
     "token"  : < Only reply when success, user's new token >
 }
        参数:
        token - User's old token
        response - A HttpServletResponse, see GetMapping.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - see GetMapping
